items.sentence: How did you know that I was going to say yes?
Don't forget that Tom is allergic to peanuts.
Did you know Tom and Mary often eat together?
Did Tom know he was doing that the wrong way?
Did Tom know Mary wasn't planning to do that?
It's highly unlikely Tom will drink any beer.
I would think Tom would appreciate your help.
Tom is worried something might happen to him.
I'm pretty sure Tom won't cancel the meeting.
Tom noticed John and Mary were holding hands.
Do you think that Tom is coming to the party?
I've never discussed this before with anyone.
Tom and I've been friends since we were kids.
I can't believe anybody would try to do that.
Tom was sure that something bad had happened.
About how long do your meetings usually last?
I think somebody should've called the police.
I want you to know we intend to be back soon.
Tom isn't good at talking about his emotions.
Tom doesn't do things the same way that I do.
